typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as date,
		year_week as string,
		value as double,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcHospitalAdmissions
SrcHospitalAdmissions select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRequiredCols
